column5: Anybody have experience with this fuel treatment?

Personally no and wouldn't after watching a couple reviews.  It appears you have to add a large amount to get the water to be "mixed" with the gas and I sure as heck wouldn't be putting that through any fuel injected system. It really shows close to the end of the video how much of the water still remains at the bottom.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7l9mU9IqMdE
